name: Kioto Flying Academy
description:
In this little flight simulator you will take the wheel of a Zero plane and pass the last exam in your flying academy.

Collect golden pancakes and avoid the red ones

[S / arrow down] - to fly up

[W / arrow up] - to fly down

* Arcade flight simulator to chill / relax

* Three levels at day, evening and  night

* Become the best student of Kioto flying academy !

Coming: bugfixes, new levels and new UI

This is my first Unity game and I'm waing for your feedback!
